main event: A witness reported seeing a large bright light hovering over a field in Indianapolis, Indiana, which suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds., The object was described as luminous, changing colors from white to yellow to red., The object appeared to be about the size of a basketball., The witness, Mary Young, had never seen a similar object before and reported it to local police., Several others also reported observing a bright object in the sky during the same time in the Indianapolis area.
witness description: Mary Young, 31 years old, female, no special experience with UFOs.
